ðŸ“– Summary: DeepScript is a tool that converts digital text into custom handwritten formats. Users can select from existing fonts or upload their own handwriting samples. The application uses the Gemini API to segment and rename characters, ultimately generating a font file that can be used to produce handwritten text.
